msg: o The Alias index now contains DN instead of a String
o Added a DnSerializer and comparator to manage the Alias index
o Unconditionally replace the Entry's DN when we pull the entry from the Master table (it was containing the RDN before)
o Exposed the SchemaManager in the EvaluatorBuilder class
